about_the_game:
Emberdrift is a roguelike flow platformer with a massive emphasis on speed, smooth-flowing movement, and insanely over-the-top weapon and ability upgrades. Power sliding, wall jumping, diagonal launching, grinding, grappling, and teleporting are only a few of the wild movement mechanics you'll employ to blast through your run. Racking up huge combos will give you the resources to unlock further upgrades and face off against some truly insane bosses. Every run in Emberdrift is unique, with different weapons, movement abilities, and world generation.

The Emberdrift demo contains the first world of the game -- The Cathedral. The demo features:

* 9 different weapons with unique movement abilities
* 2 bosses
* 2 unlockable skins
* 4 permanent upgrade tracks

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains cartoon blood and violence, insinuation of alcohol and drug consumption, and swear words.
